title: True Crime Stories - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 9/3/19
itunes:title: True Crime Stories - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 9/3/19
description:
George Noory and author Dawna Kaufmann get updates on her investigations into some of most notorious true crimes, including the JonBenet Ramsey and Scott Peterson murder cases, murders in a New Orleans hospital after Hurricane Katrina and the Las Vegas shooter.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
